description: This file contains data access functions for a to-do list application, handling CRUD operations with a database for 'todo' items, including converting database rows to dictionaries and defining functions for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting to-dos.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _row_to_dict(row)
methods.description: Converts a database row into a dictionary representing a to-do item.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] list_todos()
methods.description: Fetches all to-do items from the database, ordered by ID descending.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] get_todo(todo_id: int)
methods.description: Retrieves a specific to-do by ID, returning None if not found.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_todo(title: str, description: str = "", completed: bool = False)
methods.description: Inserts a new to-do into the database and returns the created item as a dictionary.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] update_todo(todo_id: int, fields: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Updates specified fields of an existing to-do, updates the 'updated_at' timestamp, and returns the updated item.

methods.name: bool delete_todo(todo_id: int)
methods.description: Deletes a to-do by ID, returning True if deletion was successful.

ctags.name: create_todo
ctags.pattern: /^def create_todo(title: str, description: str = "", completed: bool = False) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
ctags.signature: (title: str, description: str = "", completed: bool = False)

ctags.name: update_todo
ctags.pattern: /^def update_todo(todo_id: int, fields: Dict[str, Any]) -> Optional[Dict[str, Any]]:$/
